name: MEC Fireside Fleece Jacket - Men's
description:
Front country, backcountry and everywhere in between, the Fireside fleece is the kind of cozy you’ll always want nearby. Made from a light and warm recycled polyester fleece, this jacket useful year-round, from cutting the chill after the summer sun turns in, to layered under your shell on winter adventures.Plush midweight polyester fleece.Durable woven nylon layers added in high-wear areas.Hanger loop means you only throw it over the back of a chair when you want to.Zippered chest pocket keeps small necessities safe.Dual zippered handwarmer pockets keep your digits safe from the elements.Cord-lock at the hem seals the warm in and cold out.Regular fit feels just right.

        Sustainability
